Class ByteUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.licel.jcardsim.utils.ByteUtil

  • public final class ByteUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with byte arrays.

        status word
        Throws:

      • requireSW

        public static void requireSW(byte[] apduBuffer,
                             int expected)
        Check status word from APDU
        Parameters:
        apduBuffer - APDU bytes
        expected - expected status word
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if apduBuffer is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if apduBuffer.length is < 2
        AssertionError - if expected does not match the status word from apduBuffer
